name: Eleazar
description:
You awake in a strange place. A single thought echoes in your skull, "Not again."

[Keyboard] or (Controller)
[Arrow Keys] or [IJKL] or (D-Pad) to move.
[Space] or (A) to jump.
[D] or (Y) to die.
[S] or (X) to shoot.
[H] or (Start) for a gentle hint.

Made for Extra Credits Game Jam #3 - Cycles.

Music by Joe Kenneally.

Banner Art by Sam Linstrom.

Programming, Design, Sprites and Foley by Kevin Cole.

Special thanks to Josh Henderson and my Twitter feed for the good ideas and encouragement <3

If you like this game maybe check out my roguelike Haque or buy me a coffee!
